name: Edwin J. Wood
title: Senior Technology & Product Innovation Leader
summary: Technology and product leader with 13+ years of experience delivering digital innovation, enterprise transformation, and data visualization products. Skilled at defining multi-year roadmaps, leading high-performing teams, and turning complex data into accessible, audience-focused solutions with measurable business outcomes.

coreCompetencies.heading: Leadership & Strategy
coreCompetencies.text: Product innovation, multi-year roadmap planning, portfolio governance, KPI frameworks, executive and stakeholder alignment

coreCompetencies.heading: Data Products & Visualization
coreCompetencies.text: Data modeling, analytics-ready datasets, dashboard development, data storytelling, web application frameworks, API design

coreCompetencies.heading: Cloud & Data Engineering
coreCompetencies.text: Snowflake, Azure, AWS, SQL Server, S3 data ingestion, pipeline automation, workflow orchestration (dbt, Dagster), CI/CD, containerization, data replication, reverse ETL

coreCompetencies.heading: Systems Integration & Applications
coreCompetencies.text: CRM systems (Salesforce, Dynamics 365), enterprise application integration, workflow automation, identity and access management, API integration, post-M&A platform migration

roles.title: Senior Data Engineer
bullets: Build and maintain robust data pipelines to migrate enterprise data from SQL Server to Snowflake, orchestrating end-to-end workflows using dbt and Dagster.
Automate ingestion and transformation of S3 files into Snowflake, modeling data through staging and fact tables, and enabling analytics-ready datasets.
Support data replication workflows using Sling to synchronize curated Snowflake data back to SQL Server, ensuring downstream applications have access to the latest datasets.

roles.title: Director of Software Development
bullets: Redesigned operating model into product-led pods, improving delivery focus and reducing cycle time.
Established portfolio governance from business case through benefits realization, enabling KPI-driven prioritization and ROI tracking.
Consolidated and modernized enterprise platforms, including CRM and customer portals, reducing cost while accelerating modernization.
Directed cloud migrations and advanced CI/CD, observability, and automated testing practices to improve release safety and reliability.
Partnered with executives and finance to sequence strategic programs, ensuring alignment of multi-year roadmaps with business goals.

roles.title: Senior Manager | Manager of Software Development | Technical Lead
bullets: Built and led engineering teams delivering customer-facing products and platform integrations that supported revenue growth and efficiency.
Launched Segra360, a 0-to-1 customer portal integrating OSS/BSS systems for billing, orders, service status, and analytics.
Developed SegraMaps, a geospatial data visualization platform integrated with CRM to accelerate pre-sales targeting and qualification.
Implemented API and integration patterns across CRM, portals, and analytics systems to standardize data flow and reporting.
Executed CRM and portal migrations post-M&A, unifying platforms while minimizing business disruption.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (In Progress)
